content: the dooley hat is a charming crochet hat pattern that showcases the intricate texture of the wattle stitch this cozy and stylish hat is perfect for adding a touch of handmade elegance to any outfit the wattle stitch creates a beautifully textured fabric making the dooley hat both visually appealing and warm ideal for cooler weather whether you re looking for a new accessory or a thoughtful handmade gift the dooley hat is a delightful project for crocheters of all levels this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf download here **what s included ** 5 page printable pdf download written instruction for sizes toddler child and adult photos for visual aid size chart link to video tutorial **pattern difficulty ** easy **construction ** hat is worked from the bottom up **yarn ** wecrochet mighty stitch worsted #4 **sizing & yardage ** toddler - 18 104 yards child - 19 152 yards adult - 20 182 yards all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make
